title: Shun Nagasawa
text: is a Japanese professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player currently playing for <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> team <a href="Oita%20Trinita">Oita Trinita</a>. After working his way through the <a href="Shimizu%20S-Pulse">S-Pulse</a> youth system, he signed full professional terms in <a href="J.%20League%202007">2007</a>. He spent loan spells at J. League 2 sides <a href="Roasso%20Kumamoto">Roasso Kumamoto</a>, <a href="Kyoto%20Sanga%20F.C.">Kyoto Sanga</a> and <a href="Matsumoto%20Yamaga%20FC">Matsumoto Yamaga</a> before signing with <a href="Gamba%20Osaka">Gamba Osaka</a> in July 2015.
